title: Youtuber says what ive been saying forever. Hallelujah

embed.description: Someone had to do it Twitter ► https://twitter.com/bodytagstv ♥ STAY CONNECTED ♥ ► Twitch ----------------- http://www.twitch.tv/bodytags ► Facebook ------------ https://www.facebook.com/bodytagstv ► Instagram ------------ http://instagram.com/bodytagstv ► Google+ --------------- https://plus.google.com/+bodytagslol ► Subscribe ------------- https://goo.gl/Yz59ml Music ► Spring 617 - Approaching Nirvana Buy the song on iTunes: http://apple.co/22qhTqw

body:
Imo it started with jungle changes making it braindead to clear camps + adding buff timers in the first place.
Edit: the " you shouldnt worry about fighting the game, focus on the outplays instead" mentality that riot has is like if pokemon gave u max rare candies in ur bag because " dont worry about leveling your pokemon, instead learn its movesets." I mean for cheap trainers sure but for the real pokemasters, we level, breed, and train our pokemon through hardwork and effort.

replies.body: Braindead is the future. Stop thinking about it and buy a smartphone.
